meanings.sent1: The procreant animals welcomed their new babies with joy.

meanings.sent4: The procreant nature of the river brought life to the surrounding ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The procreant pair of birds built a cozy nest for their future chicks.

meanings.sent1: The healthy mare was considered procreant and valuable for breeding.
meanings.sent2: In the wild, only the strongest and most procreant animals pass on their genes.

meanings.sent4: The procreant instincts of the species ensured its survival through generations.
meanings.sent5: The procreant male lion roared proudly in his territory.

meanings.definition: Engaged in or relating to procreation
